text:
I was trying some things out and got an error. Does LoopVectorization not support a loop of the form
```function mymean4(func,iter)
    len = length(iter)
    total = zero(eltype(iter))
    @avx for i in iter
        total += func(i)
    end
    total/len
end```
It gives this error
`ERROR: LoadError: MethodError: no method matching canonicalize_range(::Vector{Float64})`

elements.text: I was trying some things out and got an error. Does LoopVectorization not support a loop of the form

function mymean4(func,iter)
    len = length(iter)
    total = zero(eltype(iter))
    @avx for i in iter
        total += func(i)
    end
    total/len
end
ERROR: LoadError: MethodError: no method matching canonicalize_range(::Vector{Float64})

text: The avx macro can't see inside `fun`, so if the function isn't something avx knows about it can't do much here

, so if the function isn't something avx knows about it can't do much here
